name: Lead(II) chromate
desc: Lead(II) chromate (PbCrO4) is a chemical compound, a chromate of lead. It has a vivid yellow color and is insoluble in water, and as a result, is used in paints under the name chrome yellow.
Solubility:
soluble in diluted nitric acid
insoluble in acetic acid, ammonia
